PluginDefinition.Name: IntegralConfigNOWPlugin
PluginDefinition.Description: A plugin to execute ConfigNOW commands

Operation.Name: Activate Composite
Operation.Description: Activate a previously retired SCA composite application, allowing it to resume processing requests.

Input.Name: FDCN_CONFIG_FILE
Input.Description: Properties file to used by configNOW

Operation.Name: Configure Domain
Operation.Description: Creates any resources defined in the environment and configuration file referenced as part of invocation.

Input.Name: FDCN_CONFIG_FILE
Input.Description: Properties file to used by configNOW

Operation.Name: Create Domain
Operation.Description: Create a new web logic domain

Input.Name: FDCN_CONFIG_FILE
Input.Description: Properties file to used by configNOW

Operation.Name: Custom Command
Operation.Description: Runs a custom ConfigNOW command

Input.Name: FDCN_CONFIG_FILE
Input.Description: Properties file to used by configNOW

Input.Name: FDCN_COMMAND
Input.Description: Name of custom command file to be used

Operation.Name: Configure Node Manager
Operation.Description: configures the node manager home for a WebLogic Server installation, creating all necessary configuration and security files.

Input.Name: FDCN_CONFIG_FILE
Input.Description: Properties file to used by configNOW

Operation.Name: Configure OBPM
Operation.Description: configures the deployable applications and database schema for OBPM 10g prior to deployment to a WebLogic Server environment.

Input.Name: FDCN_CONFIG_FILE
Input.Description: Properties file to used by configNOW

Operation.Name: DB Switchover
Operation.Description: performs a failover of a RAC database configuration between RAC sites. The current value of the rac.site configuration property in configuration files for the environment determines the RAC site that will be failed over to.

Input.Name: FDCN_CONFIG_FILE
Input.Description: Properties file to used by configNOW

Operation.Name: Deploy Apps
Operation.Description: deploys applications to configured targets for a WebLogic domain.

Input.Name: FDCN_CONFIG_FILE
Input.Description: Properties file to used by configNOW

Operation.Name: Deploy Composite
Operation.Description: Deploys an SCA composite application to a SOA Suite domain.

Input.Name: FDCN_CONFIG_FILE
Input.Description: Properties file to used by configNOW

Operation.Name: Deploy Composite with CP
Operation.Description: Deploys an SCA composite application to a SOA Suite domain, using the specified configuration plan.

Input.Name: FDCN_CONFIG_FILE
Input.Description: Properties file to used by configNOW

Operation.Name: Deploy OSB config
Operation.Description: Deploys a JAR file containing OSB configuration to a running domain

Input.Name: FDCN_CONFIG_FILE
Input.Description: Properties file to used by configNOW

Operation.Name: oPatch Apply
Operation.Description: opatch_apply,opatch_lsinventory , opatch_rollback command applies oracle patches to offline domain. It’s based on Oracle’s opatch utility.

Input.Name: FDCN_CONFIG_FILE
Input.Description: Properties file to used by configNOW

Operation.Name: oPatch lsInventory
Operation.Description: opatch_apply,opatch_lsinventory , opatch_rollback command applies oracle patches to offline domain. It’s based on Oracle’s opatch utility.

Input.Name: FDCN_CONFIG_FILE
Input.Description: Properties file to used by configNOW

Operation.Name: oPatch rollback
Operation.Description: opatch_apply,opatch_lsinventory , opatch_rollback command applies oracle patches to offline domain. It’s based on Oracle’s opatch utility.

Input.Name: FDCN_CONFIG_FILE
Input.Description: Properties file to used by configNOW

Operation.Name: Password Encrypter
Operation.Description: encrypts all password properties (any property ending in .password) in the properties files identified by command parameters, and writes the encrypted password values back to the properties file.

Input.Name: FDCN_CONFIG_FILE
Input.Description: Properties file to used by configNOW

Operation.Name: Set default composite
Operation.Description: sets the default revision number for a particular composite.

Input.Name: FDCN_CONFIG_FILE
Input.Description: Properties file to used by configNOW

Operation.Name: Setip OER reports
Operation.Description: packages and deploys Oracle Enterprise Repository reports into a Business Intelligence Publisher domain.

Input.Name: FDCN_CONFIG_FILE
Input.Description: Properties file to used by configNOW

Operation.Name: Shutdown All Servers
Operation.Description: stops all running servers in a domain, via contacting the admin server. This command will not perform correctly if the administration server for a domain is currently down.

Input.Name: FDCN_CONFIG_FILE
Input.Description: Properties file to used by configNOW

Operation.Name: Start Composite
Operation.Description: starts a previously stopped composite, allowing it to resume processing.

Input.Name: FDCN_CONFIG_FILE
Input.Description: Properties file to used by configNOW

Operation.Name: Start WLS Admin
Operation.Description: admin starts the administration server for a WebLogic Server domain, using the domain’s startWebLogic.sh or startWebLogic.cmd start script. Output from the server starting is displayed to screen, but the terminal used to run the command can be safely closed without interrupting the administration server.

Input.Name: FDCN_CONFIG_FILE
Input.Description: Properties file to used by configNOW

Operation.Name: SStop Composite
Operation.Description: Stops a running composite.

Input.Name: FDCN_CONFIG_FILE
Input.Description: Properties file to used by configNOW

Operation.Name: Stop WLS Admin
Operation.Description: stops the administration server for a domain if it is running currently.

Input.Name: FDCN_CONFIG_FILE
Input.Description: Properties file to used by configNOW

Operation.Name: Undeploy Composite
Operation.Description: undeploys an SCA composite from a SOA Suite domain.

Input.Name: FDCN_CONFIG_FILE
Input.Description: Properties file to used by configNOW

Operation.Name: Add JBoss User
Operation.Description: creates a management user in the nominated JBoss home.

Input.Name: FDCN_CONFIG_FILE
Input.Description: Properties file to used by configNOW

Operation.Name: Start JBoss
Operation.Description: starts the given JBoss standalone server.

Input.Name: FDCN_CONFIG_FILE
Input.Description: Properties file to used by configNOW

Operation.Name: Stop JBoss
Operation.Description: stops the given JBoss standalone server.

Input.Name: FDCN_CONFIG_FILE
Input.Description: Properties file to used by configNOW

Operation.Name: Deploy JBoss App
Operation.Description: deploys an application to local JBoss instance

Input.Name: FDCN_CONFIG_FILE
Input.Description: Properties file to used by configNOW

Operation.Name: Undeploy JBoss App
Operation.Description: undeploys an application from local JBoss instance

Input.Name: FDCN_CONFIG_FILE
Input.Description: Properties file to used by configNOW

Operation.Name: Remote Deploy App
Operation.Description: deploys an application to remote jboss instance via jboss-cli

Input.Name: FDCN_CONFIG_FILE
Input.Description: Properties file to used by configNOW

Operation.Name: Remote Undeploy App
Operation.Description: undeploys an application from remote jboss instance via jboss-cli

Input.Name: FDCN_CONFIG_FILE
Input.Description: Properties file to used by configNOW

Operation.Name: Run cli
Operation.Description: executes a cli script against a remote jboss instance via jboss-cli –f option

Input.Name: FDCN_CONFIG_FILE
Input.Description: Properties file to used by configNOW

Operation.Name: Configure Datasource
Operation.Description: configures a datasource and associated drivers in a remote jboss instance via jboss-cli

Input.Name: FDCN_CONFIG_FILE
Input.Description: Properties file to used by configNOW

Operation.Name: Stop Fuse
Operation.Description: stops the Jboss Fuse server.

Input.Name: FDCN_CONFIG_FILE
Input.Description: Properties file to used by configNOW

Operation.Name: Start Karaf Session
Operation.Description: starts a Karaf session for the given Jboss Fuse server.

Input.Name: FDCN_CONFIG_FILE
Input.Description: Properties file to used by configNOW

Operation.Name: Deploy Fuse App
Operation.Description: deploys the given application to the nominated Jboss Fuse server.

Input.Name: FDCN_CONFIG_FILE
Input.Description: Properties file to used by configNOW

Operation.Name: Undeploy Fuse App
Operation.Description: undeploys the given application from the nominated Jboss Fuse server.

Input.Name: FDCN_CONFIG_FILE
Input.Description: Properties file to used by configNOW

Operation.Name: Start Fuse
Operation.Description: starts the Jboss Fuse server.

Input.Name: FDCN_CONFIG_FILE
Input.Description: Properties file to used by configNOW

Operation.Name: Start AMQ
Operation.Description: starts a given Active MQ instance.

Input.Name: FDCN_CONFIG_FILE
Input.Description: Properties file to used by configNOW

Operation.Name: Stop AMQ
Operation.Description: stops a given Active MQ instance.

Input.Name: FDCN_CONFIG_FILE
Input.Description: Properties file to used by configNOW

Operation.Name: Start Tomcat
Operation.Description: starts the given Tomcat server.

Input.Name: FDCN_CONFIG_FILE
Input.Description: Properties file to used by configNOW

Operation.Name: Stop Tomcat
Operation.Description: stops the given Tomcat server.

Input.Name: FDCN_CONFIG_FILE
Input.Description: Properties file to used by configNOW

Operation.Name: Add Tomcat User
Operation.Description: adds a management user to the given Tomcat server.

Input.Name: FDCN_CONFIG_FILE
Input.Description: Properties file to used by configNOW

Operation.Name: Deploy Tomcat App
Operation.Description: deploys the given application to the Tomcat server.

Input.Name: FDCN_CONFIG_FILE
Input.Description: Properties file to used by configNOW

Operation.Name: Undeploy Tomcat App
Operation.Description: undeploys the given application from the Tomcat server.

Input.Name: FDCN_CONFIG_FILE
Input.Description: Properties file to used by configNOW

Operation.Name: Reload Tomcat App
Operation.Description: redeploys the given application in the Tomcat server.

Input.Name: FDCN_CONFIG_FILE
Input.Description: Properties file to used by configNOW
